meaning_str.bing:
n. 朗；(服装的)长尺寸；长裤；【语】长母音

adv. 长期地；长久地；（在某一时间或事件之前或以后）很久地
v. （尤指对看似不会很快发生的事）渴望
网络. 长整型；长整数；多头

sogou-zhongkao.adj/adv/n: 长的; 长期的[出现795次)]

1.en: His wife nagged at him all day long .
1.cn: 他妻子整天唠唠叨叨责备他。

2.en: And a wrong judgement could lead you to go the long way around.
2.cn: 一个错误的判断就会让你走很长的弯路。

3.en: But so long as struggle hard , one of today seems to be dream that can't be realized forever, can unquestionably turn into a fact tomorrow!
3.cn: 但是只要努力奋斗，今天的一个看似永远无法实现的梦想，明天一定能变成事实！

0.cn: 怎么做？蝴蝶有一根非常长的口器。

2.en: Daddy pig says the electricity won't be back for a long long time.
2.cn: 猪爸爸说电要很长的时间才会再来。

3.en: Everything in between is a bit of a mystery. Wow. That is a long way. It's a long way.
3.cn: 途中要经历什么无从知晓。路程挺长的呢。路程确实很长。

4.en: It is going to be a long night. A long day will follow. But it will be well worth it in the end.
4.cn: 这将会是一个漫长的夜晚，明天依然将会是一场苦战，但对于最终的胜利来说都值得。

5.en: How long will that be, exactly? I would say, exactly a long time. Oh, but George and I want to do some dancing.
5.cn: 那到底要等多久呢？我只能说，确实需要很长的时间。噢，但是乔治和我想跳一会儿舞。

6.en: It has been a long day. Now it is time for bed.
6.cn: 今天真是漫长的一天，现在是时候睡觉了。

7.en: Look at me, I've got nose squashing. I've got a long neck, like a giraffe.
7.cn: 看我，我的鼻子歪了。我有一个长长的脖子，像长劲鹿一样。

8.en: All right, let me rephrase the question. Why are you wearing long underwear?
8.cn: 好吧，让我重新表述下问题，你干嘛要穿长的内衣裤啊？

9.en: It has been a long day. Now it is time for bed. Good night my little piggies.
9.cn: 今天真是漫长的一天，现在是时候睡觉了。晚安，我的小猪猪。

10.en: Do you hope to stay long in the country, Mr Bingley? Just a few weeks. For the shooting.
10.cn: 你会在乡村里呆很长的时间么？只是几个星期，是来打猎的。

11.en: Peppa and George can not see each other. Peppa and George love playing in the long grass.
11.cn: 佩奇和乔治看不到对方。佩奇和乔治喜欢在长长的草丛里玩。

12.en: She is scaly, like a dragon. Can she breathe fire? No, but she has a very long tongue. Wow.
12.cn: 她有鳞片，就像龙一样。那么她能够喷火吗？不能，但是她有一个长长的舌头。哇。

13.en: You got to start small and build up slowly, even if it takes eight years. Eight long years.
13.cn: 你得小火开始慢慢加料慢慢炖，哪怕得炖他个足足八年。八个漫长的年头。

14.en: Hello, Grandpa Pig speaking. Hello, Grandpa Pig, could you help us cut some very long grass?
14.cn: 你好，我是猪爷爷，请说吧。你好啊，猪爷爷，你可以帮我们割一些长长的草吗？

15.en: It's not doing anything! You will have to be patient, Peppa. It will take a long time to grow.
15.cn: 它什么也没做！你必须耐心，佩佩。它需要很长的一段时间生长。

16.en: Down the crewmen's passage, then go right and left again at the stairs. You'll come to a long corridor.
16.cn: 左转，走船员通道，右转，到楼梯左转，就到一条长的走廊。

17.en: Don't worry, George. I've got an idea. Could we have two of the long balloons, please? Watch this, everybody.
17.cn: 别担心乔治 我有主意了，给我们两个长的气球好吗？好了，大家看好了。

18.en: And he did it every day. And Frank had a two-foot long bong under his bed that was constantly being fired up.
18.cn: 他每天都这么干，弗兰克床底下有一杆2英尺长的烟枪，永远在燃烧。

19.en: Okay. Do you think maybe it's tight because you're wearing long underwear? Yes, of course that's why it's tight.
19.cn: 好吧，你不觉得之所以会紧是因为你里面穿了套长的内衣裤吗？废话，当然是因为这个。
